duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in organizing, developing, and maintaining financial planning and analysis activities to monitor objectives and prepare status and management reports.
Perform basic financial analysis, interpretation of financial data, and ad hoc reporting with corresponding recommendations.
Provide budget information, analyses, and ad hoc reporting on division/department issues/costs.
Ensure accurate accounting procedures and practices are followed and performs various financial analysis techniques.
Handle journal uploads and customer distributions for large sum contracts.

education_certification.credential: Undergraduate bachelor’s degree in accounting or finance (Master's preferred)
